comments.author: Matthieu F
comments.content:
Hey Randy,

I have been looking a bit about the game of life, that's quite funny and interesting. I am always so amazed how human beings are able to spend so much time in so meaningless activities. If I had 100 hours per days, sure I'd like to spend two of them investigating more this game, it seems amazing and funny. My life is already full of useless activities, I cannot lose more time.
